name: Snowy's Skating Adventure
description:
Snowy's Skating Adventure, a game for one player by dddaaannn and TimSwast. This game was made for the PICO-8 Advent calendar 2019.

Help Bunny decorate his tree by finding five (5) ornaments on a frozen pond.

  • To skate, hold a direction key and press "x" to accelerate.
  • Touch an ornament to pick it up, then carry it back to the tree (touch the tree) to decorate.
  • To jump, press and release "z." Jump while in motion to clear obstacles. Hold "z" longer (or build up more speed) for longer jumps!
  • If you get stuck in water, you can jump your way out.

You can also play or download this game on the PICO-8 BBS.

Also check out Santa Panic, our game from 2018!
